segments.text: Who is your favorite NBA star ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Kobe ? I know him , the key guy of the Lakers , a heck of a NBA player . He is on fire when he breaks through enemy defense .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is competent both in driving the lane and shooting jumpers , but what really makes him formidable is his ability to switch up and dribble with his left hand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe he is not good at rebounding ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Indeed , no man can be perfect . He is just so-so in crashing the boards . Usually he plays shooting guard . Rebounding might not be his strong suit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kobe came to Beijing during this summer's Olympics . Did you go to the match between China and USA ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who wouldn't ! My friend Lee went so far as to get an autograph from him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well then , what are your spoils ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , nothing more than a jumble of photographs .
segments.speaker: S2
